#Exploratory Data Analysis

```{r}
ipo = readxl::read_excel("data/2018 IPO in China & US(final).xlsx",sheet = 1,col_names = T)
colnames(ipo)=ipo[1,]
ipo = ipo[-1,] %>% janitor::clean_names()
dim(ipo)
```

 The IPO China dataset has 325 rows and 14 columns
